components.name: Sum Yield
components.description: Summarize the PV yield per specified time period, e.g. monthly, daily, or entire year.

inputs.name: sum_mode
inputs.description: Summary mode. Options: 'day', 'month', 'year'

inputs.name: elec
inputs.description: Electricity generated by PV panel. Time series with 8760 entries, in [kWh]

components.name: SimpleST
components.description: Calculates total yield from Solar thermal collector, using simplified equation Q_th = G * F_F * A * eta_K * R_V, from the lecture Energy and Climate Systems.

inputs.name: Global_Irradiation
inputs.description: Global horizontal irradiation, in [kWh/m²]

inputs.name: FormFactor
inputs.description: Form factor, also known as orientation factor, that defines how much of the global annual irradiation is effectively used, depending on the angle of the Solar thermal collector. Fractional value [0.0, >1.0]. (Default: 1.0)

inputs.name: SurfaceArea
inputs.description: Solar thermal collector surface are in [m²]. (Default: 1.0)

inputs.name: STEfficiency
inputs.description: Thermal efficiency of collector, fractional value [0.0, 1.0]. (Default: 0.15)

inputs.name: DistributionLosses
inputs.description: Distribution losses coefficient. Fractional [0.0, 1.0]. (Default: 0.75)

components.name: NOCT PV
components.description: A PV calculation tool according to Nominal Operating Cell Temperature method Eqt. A.10 in doi: 10.1016/j.apenergy.2019.03.177

inputs.name: A
inputs.description: Area of PV system in [m²].Default is 1.0

inputs.name: eta_PVref
inputs.description: Reference PV efficiency under NOCT in [-]. Default is 0.15

inputs.name: beta
inputs.description: Temperature coefficient [-]. Default is 0.004

inputs.name: NOCT
inputs.description: Nominal operating cell temperature in [°C]. Default is 45.0

inputs.name: NOCT_ref
inputs.description: Reference temperature in [°C]. Default is 20.0

inputs.name: NOCT_sol
inputs.description: Reference irradiance in [W/m²]. Default is 800.0

inputs.name: T_amb
inputs.description: Ambient temperature hourly time series, 8760 entries, in [°C]

inputs.name: I
inputs.description: Solar irradiance on the panel. Time series with 8760 entries, in [W/m²]

outputs.name: Elec
outputs.description: Electricity generated by PV panel. Time series with 8760 entries, in [Wh]

outputs.name: effic
outputs.description: Temperature dependent efficiency of PV module. Time series with 8760 entries [-]

components.name: SimplePV
components.description: Calculates total PV electricity generation, using simplified equation E_PV = G * F_F * A * eta_PV * PR, from the lecture Energy and Climate Systems.

inputs.name: Global_Irradiation
inputs.description: Global horizontal irradiation, in [kWh/m²]

inputs.name: FormFactor
inputs.description: Form factor, also known as orientation factor, that defines how much of the global annual irradiation is effectively used, depending on the angle of the PV surface. Fractional value [0.0, >1.0]. (Default: 1.0)

inputs.name: SurfaceArea
inputs.description: PV surface are in [m²]. (Default: 1.0)

inputs.name: PVEfficiency
inputs.description: PV technology efficiency, fractional value [0.0, 1.0]. (Default: 0.15)

inputs.name: PerformanceRatio
inputs.description: Performance Ratio, depends on how well the PV is exposed (shaded, not) and how clean it is (dirty, dusty, super clean). Fractional [0.0, 1.0]. (Default: 0.75)

inputs.name: PV_tech
inputs.description: Choose PV technology
